literature.title: Literature
literature.description: Exploring philosophy, artificial intelligence, spirituality, and the nature of existence through the written word.
literature.authorDesc: Author of philosophical and scientific works exploring the intersection of technology, consciousness, and spirituality.

science.title: Science &
science.description: Exploring artificial intelligence, data science, and the bridge between analytical intelligence and vibrational wisdom.
science.aiSocietyDesc: How AI impacts human civilization, work, and the future of humanity.
science.consciousnessTechDesc: The intersection of AI and spiritual awareness, exploring new paradigms of intelligence.
science.vibrationalIntelDesc: Beyond traditional AI — exploring the next frontier of conscious, vibrational awareness.
science.visionQuote: From artificial intelligence to vibrational intelligence — the future lies not just in making machines smarter, but in elevating human consciousness alongside technology.
science.visionText: I believe we stand at a unique moment in history where technology and spirituality can converge. My work aims to bridge the gap between analytical intelligence and deeper forms of awareness, offering perspectives that help humanity thrive in the age of AI while staying connected to our essential nature.

interciel.title: Interciel
interciel.subtitle: Building the future of artificial intelligence — where technology meets vision.
interciel.description1: Interciel.ai represents my vision for the future of artificial intelligence — a company dedicated to creating intelligent solutions that not only solve problems but also elevate human potential.
interciel.description2: Drawing from my experience in Data Science, AI, and my unique perspective on consciousness and technology, Interciel.ai aims to bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI capabilities and meaningful human impact.
interciel.visionText: To create AI solutions that enhance human intelligence and consciousness, bridging the gap between technological innovation and spiritual wisdom.
interciel.missionText: Building intelligent systems that serve humanity's highest potential, combining analytical power with ethical responsibility and conscious design.
interciel.stayConnectedDesc: Follow our journey and be the first to know about new developments.

politics.title: Politics
politics.description: A new chapter begins. Bringing together experience in technology, philosophy, and a vision for a better future.
politics.stayInformedDesc: Be the first to know when we launch. Sign up for updates.
politics.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
politics.quote: The future belongs to those who bridge science and soul, technology and humanity, innovation and wisdom.

bookSession.title: Book a
bookSession.description: Personal consultations for AI, writing, music, and mentorship. Let's explore ideas and create together.

faqs.a1: Each session is tailored to your needs. We'll discuss your goals, challenges, and explore solutions together. Whether it's AI strategy, writing advice, or creative direction, I bring my full expertise and attention to your specific situation.
faqs.a2: Come with specific questions or topics you'd like to explore. For AI consulting, have an overview of your current situation. For creative collaborations, share any relevant work in advance.
faqs.a3: Life happens! Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. No-shows may be charged a partial fee.
faqs.a4: Sessions are not recorded by default to ensure privacy. If you'd like a recording for reference, let me know in advance.

footer.description: Writer, Scientist, Musician — Exploring where science meets soul. Bridging artificial intelligence with vibrational wisdom.
